title: Holy Family with Saints John the Baptist and Elizabeth
description: seated Madonna at left wearing blue, red and white garment and a cloth on her head, holding Christ child, in a blue and white garment and holding a cross; Madonna caresses the chin of John the Baptist as a toddler, in an animal skin; Elizabeth in salmon garment and head cloth behind toddler; man in URC; basket of textiles, LLC; lamb, LRC
